title: Open-radiomics: A Collection of Standardized Datasets and a Technical Protocol for Reproducible Radiomics Machine Learning Pipelines. (arXiv:2207.14776v2 [q-bio.QM] UPDATED)
abstract: Purpose: As an important branch of machine learning pipelines in medical imaging, radiomics faces two major challenges namely reproducibility and accessibility. In this work, we introduce open-radiomics, a set of radiomics datasets along with a comprehensive radiomics pipeline based on our proposed technical protocol to investigate the effects of radiomics feature extraction on the reproducibility of the results.  Materials and Methods: Experiments are conducted on BraTS 2020 open-source Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) dataset that includes 369 adult patients with brain tumors (76 low-grade glioma (LGG), and 293 high-grade glioma (HGG)). Using PyRadiomics library for LGG vs. HGG classification, 288 radiomics datasets are formed; the combinations of 4 MRI sequences, 3 binWidths, 6 image normalization methods, and 4 tumor subregions. translated_abstract: 目的：作为医学影像中机器学习流程的一个重要分支，放射组学面临着两个主要挑战，即可重复性和可访问性。在这项工作中，我们介绍了开放放射组学，一套放射组学数据集以及基于我们提出的技术协议的综合放射组学流程，以研究放射组学特征提取对结果可重复性的影响。材料和方法：实验使用BraTS 2020开源磁共振成像（MRI）数据集进行，包括369名患有脑肿瘤的成年患者（76例低级别胶质瘤（LGG）和293例高级别胶质瘤（HGG））。使用PyRadiomics库进行LGG与HGG分类，形成了288个放射组学数据集；其中包括4个MRI序列、3个binWidths、6种图像归一化方法和4个肿瘤次区域的组合。使用随机森林分类器，并为每个放射组学数据集进行训练-验证-测试（60%/20%/20%）实验，采用不同的数据划分和m
tldr: 本研究提出了一套开放放射组学数据集和技术协议，旨在解决放射组学在结果可重复性和可访问性方面所面临的挑战。通过在BraTS 2020数据集上进行实验，研究了放射组学特征提取对结果可重复性的影响。
en_tdlr: The paper introduces open-radiomics, a collection of standardized datasets and a technical protocol for reproducible radiomics machine learning pipelines. The study aims to address the challenges of reproducibility and accessibility in radiomics by investigating the effects of radiomics feature extraction on the reproducibility of the results using the BraTS 2020 dataset.
